revision.text:
{{Infobox dungeon |name = Castelia Sewers |image = [[File:Castelia Sewers.png|300px]] |caption = A map of Castelia Sewers. |tokens = 146,500 |location = Castelia City }} '''Castelia Sewers''' is a [[Dungeons|dungeon]] in [[Unova]]. It initially has 81 tiles arranged in an 9x9 square, including 9 chest tiles, 21 non-boss encounter tiles, and 1 boss encounter tile. Wild Encounters have 2,603,000 HP.
==Encounter Tables==
===Wild Encounters===
{| class="wikitable" |- ! Wild Pokémon !! colspan=2|Trainers |- ! Encounter !! Trainer !! Pokémon Team |- | [[File:Rattata.png|40px]] Rattata || [[File:Janitor.png|40px]] Janitor Felix || [[File:Lillipup.png|40px]] Lillipup, [[File:Trubbish.png|40px]] Trubbish |- | [[File:Zubat.png|40px]] Zubat || [[File:Doctor.png|40px]] Doctor Heath || [[File:Sewaddle.png|40px]] Sewaddle |- | [[File:Grimer.png|40px]] Grimer || [[File:Worker.png|40px]] Worker Zack || [[File:Drilbur.png|40px]] Drilbur |- | rowspan=2|[[File:Muk.png|40px]] Muk || [[File:Worker.png|40px]] Worker Scott || [[File:Timburr.png|40px]] Timburr |- | [[File:Scientist_(female).png|40px]] Scientist Caroline || [[File:Grimer.png|40px]] Grimer |- | rowspan=2|[[File:Trubbish.png|40px]] Trubbish || [[File:Scientist_(male).png|40px]] Scientist Clarke || [[File:Magnemite.png|40px]] Magnemite |- | [[File:Janitor.png|40px]] Janitor Brady || [[File:Marill.png|40px]] Marill, [[File:Cinccino.png|40px]] Cinccino |}
